name: Merge .EXE Super Monster
description:
With the same gameplay as the other Merging game such but Merge Super Chapter 2 will bring to you the other monster, newer, more special, more powerful & more amazing, with unique, distinct character concepts.

How to play:
- Merge the same animals or warriors to Create stronger monsters.
- Organize position with strategies to win
- Buy more troops and monsters to fight

Merge to evolve, Build your powerful team. Are you ready for this challenge ???
